statements: UPDATE Plants SET watering_schedule = 'Every Monday and Thursday' WHERE plant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Plants SET irrigation_schedule = 'Twice a week' WHERE plant_name = 'Rosemary';
UPDATE Plants SET watering_schedule = 'twice a week' WHERE plant_name = 'Rose' AND irrigation_schedule = 'daily';
UPDATE Plants SET plant_name = 'Sunflower', watering_schedule = 'once a week' WHERE plant_id = '12d3-4567-89ab-cdef';
UPDATE Plant SET watering_interval = 7, irrigation_duration = 10 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE Task SET task_date = '2022-08-15', task_description = 'Watering and fertilizing', task_name = 'Watering', plant_id = 1 WHERE task_id = 2;
UPDATE Plant SET plant_name = 'Sunflower', watering_interval = 3 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE Task SET task_description = 'Watering and fertilizing', task_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE task_id = 2;
UPDATE Plant SET plant_name = 'Sunflower', plant_type = 'Annual' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE IrrigationSchedule SET water_quantity = 500.75, water_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE schedule_id = 3;
UPDATE Plant SET plant_type = 'Tropical' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE WateringTask SET completed = 1, task_type = 'Regular Watering' WHERE plant_id = 2;

UPDATE Plant SET name='Rose', height=20 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Plant SET height=30, name='Sunflower' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Plant SET watering_schedule = 'twice a week', light_exposure = 'direct sunlight' WHERE id = 1;
